snippet: Manuel Neuer, the goalkeeper who won the World Cup with Germany, will challenge Cristiano Ronaldo and Lionel Messi for soccer’s highest award.
abstract: Manuel Neuer, goalkeeper who won the World Cup with Germany, will challenge Cristiano Ronaldo and Lionel Messi for the Ballon d’Or, soccer’s highest award.
lead_paragraph: Manuel Neuer, the goalkeeper who won the World Cup with Germany, will challenge Cristiano Ronaldo and Lionel Messi for soccer’s highest award.

headline.main: Germany’s Goalie Up for Ballon d’Or
